data.title: Bach Cantatas & Other Vocal Works
data.meta_description: Discography and Discussions of J.S. Bach's Vocal Works performed by the artist
data.text:
Recorded & filmed live at Salle des Concerts, Cité de la Musique, Paris, France.

Recorded, filmed & broadcast by France Musique.

2nd recording of Cantata BWV 198 by J.E. Gardiner.

Watch on YouTube:

Cantata BWV 198: Complete Cantata [33:30] | Complete Cantata [33:30]

Cantatas BWV 198, BWV 4, BWV 113, BWV 179, BWV 199 [124:10] (other cantatas are from other concerts)

Recorded at Cadogan Hall, London, England.

Producer: Andrew Mellor; Recording Engineer: Mike Hatch; Assistant: George Pierson; Tape Editor: Andrew Mellor; Editions: Breitkopf & Härtel, Carus-Verlag; Executive Poducers: Isabella de Sabata, Cécile Pauty.

2nd recording of Cantata BWV 106 by J.E. Gardiner.

1st recording of Oster-Oratorium BWV 249 by J.E. Gardiner.

Buy this album at:

CD (2013): Amazon.com | Amazon.co.uk | Amazon.de | Monteverdi Choir

Music Download: Amazon.com | Amazon.co.uk | Amazon.de | Monteverdi Choir

Recorded & filmed live during the Proms at Royal Albert Hall, London, England. Broadcast by BBC. Produceer: Jonathan Haswell; Series Editor: Oliver MacFarlane; Executive Producer: Helen Mansfield.

3rd recording of Cantata BWV 11 by J.E. Gardiner.

2nd recording of Oster-Oratorium BWV 249 by J.E. Gardiner.

Watch on YouTube:

Oster-Oratorium BWV 249; Complete Work, including spoken introduction [46:58] | Complete Work [42:18]

Himmelfahrts-Oratorium BWV 11: Complete Work, with spoken introduction [35:37] | Complete Work [29:51]

01:11-02:50: F. Mendelssohn: Singet dem Herrn ein neues Lied, Op. 91 [1:39]

03:13-06:20: G.C. Biller: Mit Fried und Freud, Arrangement BWV 125 [3:07]

07:34-16:47: Concerto for 4 harpsichords, strings & continuo in A minor, BWV 1065 [9:13]

18:20-49:25: Cantata Ich bin in mir vergnügt, BWV 204 [31:05]

50:30-57:30: H. Schütz: Meine Seele erhebt den Herren, SWV 494 [7:00]

58:08-59:10: Cantata So wandelt froh auf Gottes Wegen, BWV 197: Mvt. 10: Chorale [1:02]

Recorded & filmed live at Chateau de Versailles, France. The concert was broadcast live by ARTE.

3rd recording of Cantata BWV 4 by J.E. Gardiner.

Watch on YouTube:

Cantata BWV 4: Complete Cantata [22:25] | Complete Cantata [23:46]

Recorded live at the Guildhall School of Music & Drama's Milton Court Concert Hall, London, England.

Producer: Isabella de Sabata; Recording Engineer: Mike Hatch (Floating Earth Ltd); Recording Assistants: Chris Kalkov, George Pierson; Publisher: Breikopf & Härtel, edited by Carl Adolf Martienssen.

2nd recording of Cantata BWV 199 by. J.E. Gardiner.

Buy this album at:

Music Download (2014): Amazon.com | Amazon.co.uk | Amazon.de | ClassicsOnline

Recorded at St Judes Church, Hampstead Garden Suburb, London, England, at the end of a European tour.

Producer: Isabella de Sabata; Recording Engineer: Mike Hatch; Assistant: Michael Gerrard; Editor: Stephen Frost; Executive Producer: Isabella de Sabata; Edition by Bärenreiter.

2nd recording of Cantata BWV 151 by. J.E. Gardiner.

Buy this album at:

CD (2017): Amazon.com | Amazon.co.uk | Amazon.de | ArkivMusic

Music Download: Amazon.com | Amazon.co.uk | Amazon.de | iTunes

Recorded & filmed live at Royal Albert Hall, London, England, in the frame of BBC Proms 2021. J.E. Gardiner and the English Baroque Soloists marking his 60th appearance at the Proms. Presented by Petroc Trelawny. Broadcast by BBC on Sep 5, 2021.

4th recording of Cantata BWV 4 by J.E. Gardiner.

Watch on YouTube:

Cantata BWV 4: Complete Cantata [22:23] | Complete Cantata [22:43]
